column1: 34543,I Am an Avenger (2010) #5,5,10520,124,"The grand finale is here as Captain America faces off against a very nasty HYDRA horde...and unwittingly holds the fate of a young boy in the balance! The newest Ant-Man, Eric O'Grady, has never been a team player but will his new position amidst the ranks of Earth's Mightiest Heroes be his redemption...or a one way ticket to the bench?! And Thor brightens up the Young Avengers day in a very special story brought to you by the legendary Alan Davis!",
